user_query: Why is IDV important?
agent_reply: IDV ensures you receive the original invoice value in the event of a total loss. In the case of a total loss, this cover guarantees that the payout will match the original purchase price of the vehicle as per the invoice, rather than the depreciated current value, providing greater financial relief.
